Text: The Late Late Show with James Corden:  It is the fourth iteration of "The Late Late Show".

Text: The Late Late Show with James Corden:  Airing in the U.S. from Monday to Friday nights, it is taped in front of a studio audience Monday through Thursday afternoons – during weeks in which first-run episodes are scheduled to air – at CBS Television City in Los Angeles, California in Studio 56, directly above the Bob Barker Studio (Studio 33).
